00010             "username"  => false,
00011             "password"  => false,
00012             "database"  => false,

00019     function __construct() {
00020         global $db_config;
00021         $this->settings = array_merge($this->settings, $db_config);
00022         if($this->settings["error_file"] === true) $this->settings["error_file"] = dirname(__FILE__)."/__mysql_errors.log";
00023     }
00024 
00025     function connect() {
00026         $this->data = new mysqli(
00027             $this->settings["servername"], 
00028             $this->settings["username"], 
00029             $this->settings["password"], 
00030             $this->settings["database"],
00031             $this->settings["serverport"]
00032         );
00033 
00034         if(mysqli_connect_errno()) { 
00035             $this->error("Connection error: ".mysqli_connect_error() ); 
00036             return false; 
00037         }
00038         if(!$this->data->set_charset("utf8")) {
00039             $this->error("Error loading character set utf8");
00040             return false;
00041         }
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044 
00045     function query($sql) {
00046         if(!$this->data && !$this->connect()) {
00047             $this->error("Could node connect for query: ".$sql);
00048             return false;
00049         }
00050         //echo $sql."<br />:";
00051         if(!($this->result = $this->data->query($sql))) $this->error($sql);
00052         return ($this->result) ? true : false;
00053     }
00054     
00055     function nextr(){
00056         if(!$this->result) {
00057             $this->error("No query pending");
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060         unset($this->row);
00061         $this->row = $this->result->fetch_array(MYSQL_BOTH);
00062         return ($this->row) ? true : false ;
00063     }
00064 
00065     function get_row($mode = "both") {
00066         if(!$this->row) return false;
00067 
00068         $return = array();
00069         switch($mode) {
00070             case "assoc":
00071                 foreach($this->row as $k => $v) {
00072                     if(!is_int($k)) $return[$k] = $v;
00073                 }
00074                 break;
00075             case "num":
00076                 foreach($this->row as $k => $v) {
00077                     if(is_int($k)) $return[$k] = $v;
00078                 }
00079                 break;
00080             default:
00081                 $return = $this->row;
00082                 break;
00083         }
00084         return array_map("stripslashes",$return);
00085     }
00086 
00087     function get_all($mode = "both", $key = false) {
00088         if(!$this->result) {
00089             $this->error("No query pending");
00090             return false;
00091         }
00092         $return = array();
00093         while($this->nextr()) {
00094             if($key !== false) $return[$this->f($key)] = $this->get_row($mode);
00095             else $return[] = $this->get_row($mode);
00096         }
00097         return $return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     function f($index) {
00101         return stripslashes($this->row[$index]);
00102     }
00103 
00104     function go_to($row) {
00105         if(!$this->result) {
00106             $this->error("No query pending");
00107             return false;
00108         }
00109         if(!$this->data->data_seek($row)) $this->error();
00110     }
00111 
00112     function nf() {
00113         if (!$this->result) {
00114             $this->error("nf: no result set");
00115             return false;
00116         }
00117         return $this->result->num_rows;
00118     }
00119     function af() {
00120         return $this->data->affected_rows;
00121     }
00122     function error($string = "") {
00123         $error = $this->data->error;
00124         if($this->settings["show_error"]) echo $error;
00125         if($this->settings["error_file"] !== false) {
00126             $handle = @fopen($this->settings["error_file"], "a+");
00127             if($handle) {
00128                 @fwrite($handle, "[".date("Y-m-d H:i:s")."] ".$string." <".$error.">\n");
00129                 @fclose($handle);
00130             }
00131         }
00132         if($this->settings["dieonerror"]) {
00133             if(isset($this->result)) $this->result->free();
00134             @$this->data->close();
00135             die();
00136         }
00137     }
00138     function insert_id() {
00139         return $this->data->insert_id;
00140     }
00141     function escape($string) {
00142         if(!$this->data) return addslashes($string);
00143         return $this->data->escape_string($string);
00144     }
00145 
00146     function destroy() {
00147         if(isset($this->result)) $this->result->free();
00148         if($this->data) $this->data->close();
00149     }
